channel.title: Bridge on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Bridge on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: CO-300 East - Arkansas River
item.description: CO-300 east crossing the Arkansas River. This is near the headwaters of the Arkansas River. The Mosquito Range is in the background.

item.title: US-93 North - East Fork Bitterroot River
item.description: East Fork Bitterroot River bridge on US-93 North.

item.title: US-93 North - North Fork Salmon River
item.description: US-93 North at North Fork Salmon River bridge.

item.title: ID-55 North - Canyon County/Snake River
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: ID-78 West - Owyhee County/Snake River
item.description: Entering Owyhee County on ID-78 West at the Snake River bridge.

item.title: WY-374 West - Green River
item.description: Green River bridge on WY-374 west.

item.title: US-191 North - Price River
item.description: Price River on US-191 north in Carbon County.

item.title: I-80 West - North Platte River
item.description: I-80 west crossing the North Platte River in Carbon County. Milemarker 229.03 in the background.

item.title: ID-52 West at Payette River
item.description: ID-52 west at Payette River in Emmett.

item.title: FL-292 West - Theo Baars Bridge
item.description: FL-292 West at Theo Baars Bridge over the Intracostal Waterway.

item.title: I-10 East - Enter Hancock County Mississippi
item.description: Enter Hancock County Mississippi on I-10 east. Taken on the Pearl River bridge.

item.title: US-90 West - Mississippi River
item.description: Crossing the Mississippi River at the Huey Long Bridge on US-90 west.

item.title: OR-201 North - Owyhee River
item.description: OR-201 north at the Owyhee River.

item.title: US-197 North - Entering Washington
item.description: Entering Washington on US-197 North. Taken on a bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: OR-39 South - Lost River
item.description: Lost River on OR-39 south.

item.title: OR-331 South - Umatilla River
item.description: Bridge over Umatilla River on OR-331 south.

item.title: US-12 East - Walla Walla River
item.description: US-12 East at Walla Walla River bridge. The Walla Walla River flows into the Columbia River immediately west of this bridge.

item.title: OR-402 West - North Fork John Day River
item.description: North Fork John Day River bridge on OR-402 west in Monument.

item.title: US-26 East - South Fork John Day River
item.description: US-26 East at the South Fork John Day River bridge.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching OR-37 Jct. at Umatilla River Bridge.
item.description: US-30 West approaching OR-37 Jct. crossing the Umatilla River bridge.

item.title: WA-285 North - Chelan County
item.description: Entering Chelan County on the Columbia River bridge on WA-285 north. Also entering Wenatchee, the county seat of Chelan County.

item.title: AK-9 North - Resurrection River
item.description: Resurrection River bridge on AK-9 north.

item.title: AK-9 South - Resurrection River
item.description: AK-9 south (Seward Highway) crossing the Resurrection River. The Resurrection River flows into the ocean at Resurrection Bay just south of this bridge.

item.title: US-95 North - Weiser River
item.description: Crossing the Weiser River on US-95 north. Approaching Weiser Truck Route.

item.title: US-2 West/US-191 North - Milk River
item.description: US-2 West/US-191 North crossing the Milk River

item.title: MT-200 East - Big Dry Creek
item.description: MT-200 east at Big Dry Creek in Jordan. When this picture was taken, it was a rainy day, and the creek was quite wet.

item.title: MT-200 East - Musselshell River
item.description: MT-200 east at the Musselshell River. The Musselshell River is a tributary of the Missouri River, running east-west through central Montana.

item.title: NM-456 - Dry Cimarron River
item.description: Crossing the Dry Cimarron River on NM-456 east. The Dry Cimarron River is known as the Cimarron River when it crosses into Oklahoma. When this photo was taken in the spring of 2014, there were puddles in the river.

item.title: US-97 South - Entering Oregon
item.description: Entering Oregon on US-97 south, crossing the Columbia River.

item.title: NM-75 East Approaching NM-68
item.description: NM-75 East approaching NM-68 at the Anthony K. Baca Bridge over Embudo Creek.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Rio Grande
item.description: US-84/US-285 South - Rio Grande in Española. The bridge over the Rio Grande is called the Stanley A. Griego Bridge.

item.title: I-80 East - Carquinez Bridge Toll Plaza
item.description: Approaching the Carquinez Bridge Toll Plaza on I-80 east. When this photo was taken in Fall 2010, the auto toll was $5.00. The Carquinez Bridge crosses the Carquinez Straits, through which the Sacramento and San Joaquin Delta empty into, before reaching the San Pablo Bay.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 26 - Crockett/Pomona St. The Carqinuez Bridge bridge over the Carquinez Straits begins here. The eastbound direction over the bridge pays tolls. All Fastrak users, use the left lane. Fastrak is a transponder system used to pay tolls in California.

item.title: US-89 North - Snake River
item.description: Crossing the Snake River on US-89 north.

item.title: I-8 East - Colorado River
item.description: I-8 east at the Colorado River. The Colorado River marks the boundary between California and Arizona.

item.title: US-12 East - Idaho State Line
item.description: Errant US-12 shield displayed as a state route shield on the Interstate bridge over the Snake River on the Idaho border.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 1 (Oregon)
item.description: I-82 east on the Columbia River bridge approaching Oregon Exit 1, To US-395/US-730/Hermiston/Umatilla.

item.title: End CA-62 East - Arizona Border
item.description: End CA-62 east at the Colorado River, California-Arizona Line
